infos.value: Oh, Adelard. How fares the hunt for Dorando and Gargas?
What timing. You need no longer concern yourself with those two.
Instead, I would like you to return to Hourne Castle.
We have reports that Xiza and Vistralle have taken Machérie prisoner as an act of treason.
Wh-what...? And where have they taken her?
Hence we make haste to Leonis Castle.
No, I need you at Hourne Castle, protecting Dario.
I do not know where Machérie was met with betrayal.
Yet if it happened near Hourne Castle, Dario could be in harm's way as well.
Understood, Your Highness. I will not fail you.
And what of you? Do you intend to weather these circumstances in pursuit of Dorando and Gargas?
I will go to Leonis Castle.
Then may I request your guidance? Having someone familiar with the castle's design would be most heartening.
